content: What has disturbed me is that once you dig down, the majority, if not almost all, of events attributed to “the alt right” are actually being carried out by Militant liberals attempting to justify their imaginary boogie man….”the Alt Right”. Its really sad…and dangerous..and Liberals seem to have no sense of integrity. ALMOST ALL of the violence and destruction we have seen has been committed by militant members of the Left since Trumps election.
